Pre-Game Insights: The Mali team has had an undefeated run in the tournament so far.
The Burkina Faso team has scored three goals in the group stage compared to two for Mali.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams have played at the Amadou Gon Coulibaly Stadium before, with Mali winning one game and drawing another.
Others: The Burkina Faso team has expressed confidence in their ability to win the match despite their loss in the group stage.
